> With the blast coming fast and furious, Tucson swiftly reacts and withou=
t a fit of rage but a quiet, swift and graceful interlude of dexterity and =
balance, he attempts to deflect the blast with a complex blocking maneuver =
using a combination of Tai Chi and deflective artistry only taught by Yoket=
ron himself, which was rarely taught to anyone except to those he felt were=
 deserving of the training.  Tucson was one of those students worthy of suc=
h an ancient art.  He performs the maneuver in draconic form, as he gracefu=
lly twists his body around to attempt to meet the blast with his blocking m=
aneuver.  He spins swiftly on one foot, as his tail coils around his body a=
s part of the block.  He hoped it would help, his comrades were depending o=
n him.
> 
> It would almost appear that Master Yoketron was alive and well =
inside Tucson.
> 

OOC - Writing this here, and I assume all the Maximals/P=
redacons are together with Tuscon.  if I'm incorrect in things (aka they're=
 separated while being rushed by the Sharkticons), let me know and will rew=
rite!

As they were seemingly rusehd by a legion of SHARKTICONS, the PREDAC=
ONS were faced with a contradiction from the days of old  - the Predacacons=
 were barely in many cases bigger than the Sharkticons, who had much more i=
ntense numbers and were deadly in close range!

DINOBOT fell back, "WE will=
 be overwhelmed in close quarters.  Suggestions?"

His optic lasers doing m=
inimal damage then!

DRILL BIT called out, "He who fights and runs away.."
